Game.Name: Shining Soul (Japan)
Game.plot: IntroductionShining Soul makes the player take the role of a warrior torn between two directly opposing groups: The Dark Dragons and the Shining Fleet. The game lets the wizard choose to pertain to one of four classes: fighter, wizard, archer, or dragonute. The game allows high customization of the character, including weapons, clothing, color schemes, armor etc. The game allows link up play with up to four players, to fight in cooperative combat. The gameplay presents itself as a typical hack-n-slash RPG, with the opbective of collecting gold, clothes, weapons etc. as well as constant hunting for experience points to level up. The game has a sequel called, simply Shining Soul II, in which the core gameplay remains practically the same but many extra features ($ new classes, collectible cards, arena, side quests etc.) are added.
